strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.success.e: The channel, **${channel}**, has been successfully unlocked.
strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.error.uns: The channel you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid channel/ID.
strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.error.pro: An error occured when executing this command.
strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.error.alr: This channel was either already unlocked, or hasn't been locked whatsoever!
strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.error.bot: I am missing the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission. Please turn that on so I can remove the lockdown from this channel.
strings.discord.commands.unlockchannel.error.use: You are missing the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission. Please have the required permission so you can remove the lockdown from this channel.
